he Selvetargtlin, meaning the "Warriors of Selvetarm", was the primary religious organization dedicated to the worship and service of the god Selvetarm, Lolths champion.
Their ranks were largely made up of males,
The Selvetargtlin were known for wearing blood-red robes, often over a coat of chain mail.
In the , the Selvetargtlin launched an attack against the Promenade of Eilistraee. They were led by a judicator, Dhairn. Although the followers of Selvetarm failed to take the temple, they did considerable damage to the followers of Eilistraee.
